Posts.Content: Mar 15, 2011 06:46AM - edited Mar 15, 2011 06:48AM by Black-cat Having  a few  drinks a couple of days before surgery is fine.  Smoking is a big no no, but alcohol should not affect you as long as you don't have a history with problem drinking and don't overdo it.
